identity.name: Battwheels OS
identity.aesthetic: Dark Mode Command Center, Glassmorphism, Neon Accents

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Barlow:wght@400;600;700&family=Manrope:wght@400;500;700&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400&display=swap');

usage.primary: Electric Cyan (#22d3ee) - Use for CTAs, active states, and key metrics
usage.secondary: Slate Blue - Use for card backgrounds and secondary elements
usage.accent: Warning Orange (#f97316) - Use for alerts, warnings, and attention-grabbing highlights
usage.text: Off-white for readability, never pure white on dark backgrounds

structure.sidebar: Fixed left sidebar, glassmorphism effect (bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md), border-r border-border/50
structure.cards: Rounded-xl border border-white/10 bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-sm shadow-lg hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(34,211,238,0.3)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-md font-semibold tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 border border-white/10 rounded-md font-medium

cards.dashboard_metric: p-6 flex flex-col justify-between h-full relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.default: bg-background/50 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 rounded-md

navigation.sidebar_item: flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-3 rounded-lg text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground hover:bg-white/5 transition-colors

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle radial gradients in backgrounds to create depth. Avoid linear gradients on text.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use thin strokes (1.5px) for a technical look.

motion.loading: Pulse effects on skeletons, spinning loaders for data fetching

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors defined in 'colors.palette'. Ensure 'darkMode' is set to 'class'.
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to src/index.css immediately.
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'Layout' component that includes the Sidebar and a scrollable main content area. Use the 'glassmorphism' styles for the sidebar.
4. DASHBOARD: Implement the dashboard using the 'Bento Grid' layout. Use the 'dashboard_metric' card style for the top stats.
5. CHARTS: Use Recharts for the 'Vehicle Status Distribution' (Donut) and 'Repair Time Trend' (Bar). Style them with the 'chart_*' colors.

6. AI MODULE: For the 'Answer Module', create a chat-like interface or a search-bar style input that expands into a solution card. Use 'primary' color for the AI's responses to highlight intelligence.
7. TABLES: For 'Vehicles in Workshop', use a clean table with 'border-b border-white/10' for rows. No vertical borders.
8. MOBILE: Ensure the sidebar collapses into a hamburger menu on mobile screens.
9. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, sidebar links) as per the critical rules.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'Bootstrap' looks. Use custom spacing and typography.
Dark mode is the DEFAULT and ONLY mode for this application (as per user request).
Do not use 'alert()' or native confirm dialogs. Use Shadcn Dialogs.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background (APCA/WCAG AA).
